meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by corynebacteria.
meanings.sent1: The corynebacterial infection was treated with antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the corynebacterial growth under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The corynebacterial party in the petri dish was a hit among the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The corynebacterial presence in the lab was as noticeable as a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the corynebacterial culture was distinct and unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A type of bacteria belonging to the genus Corynebacterium.
meanings.sent1: The corynebacterial can be identified by its unique shape.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a new corynebacterial strain in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The corynebacterial in the lab seemed to be having a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: The corynebacterial spread through the culture like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The corynebacterial colony was a bustling community under the microscope.
